aircraft.value: Nighthawk Stealth - AC-2293-830 at Base Delta

defect_observed.value: Arming circuit safety interlock fault. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fire Control component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 12/08/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 13/08/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 14/08/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 15/08/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 21/08/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fire Control component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
